text: To search for UDRs with specific values in certain fields, you can configure these fields on the ECS Inspector - Searchable Fields page. Note! These configurations must be made before UDRs are sent to the ECS by the ECS forwarding agent. This section has the following subsections: Adding Labels for Searchable Fields Deleting a label from Searchable Fields Mapping UDR Fields to Labels Editing UDR Fields mappings Deleting UDR Fields mappings
title: Configuring ECS Searchable Fields - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
